task.title: Enable Apple FairPlay in TVSDK applications
task.shortdesc:
You can implement Apple FairPlay Streaming, which is Apple's DRM solution, in your
applications.

step.cmd: Create your FairPlay Customer Resource Loader by implementing PTAVAssetResourceLoaderDelegate.

info.p:
For more information, see .
Ensure that you follow the instructions in the FairPlay Streaming Program Guide (FairPlayStreaming_PG.pdf), which is included in FairPlay Server SDK for Developing a FPS-Aware App).
The resourceLoader:shouldWaitForLoadingOfRequestedResource method is equivalent to what is in AVAssetResourceLoaderDelegate.
info.note: In the ExpressPlay license server scenario, to play back content, change the URL scheme in your ExpressPlay FairPlay server license request URL from skd:// to http:// (or https://).

step.cmd: Register the FairPlay Customer Resource Loader with registerPTAVAssetResourceLoader.

postreq.p: If you wrote your own FairPlay license server, or you are using a third-party FairPlay license server, consult your license server vendor to determine your license server URL, formatting, and any other requirements.
